data.title: Brian M. Kleiner
data.text:
Dr. John G. Casali receives 2017 A. R. Lauer Safety Award from Human Factors and Ergonomics Society (October 2017)

ISE Faculty and Staff recognized for combined 180 years of service (June 2017)

Dr. Brian Kleiner has been named Scholar of the Week by the Office of the Vice President for Research and Innovation (December 2016)

A Front Row Seat to Theory of Organization [Page 8 in Engineers' Forum] (February 2015)

Are you one of the thousands of engineering alumni who took Paul Torgersenâ€™s class; if so we want your memories (March 2014)

Brian M. Kleiner named Ralph H. Bogle Jr. Professor in Industrial and Systems Engineering (November 2013)

Virginia Tech contracts with Australian university in effort to reduce U.S. construction injuries (February 2013)

Brian M. Kleiner named director of Myers-Lawson School of Construction (December 2010)

Virginia Tech researchers, collaborators receive award from Centers for Disease Control and Prevention for occupational safety, health in construction research (October 2009)
